## git

2. git
3. ,git

## git
1. 
	\`git config --global user.name "John Doe"
	git config --global user.email johndoe@example.com
	\`
2. ssh
	`cd ~/.ssh` `ls`
	,,enter
	\`\`\`
	ssh-keygen
	cat \~/.ssh/id\_rsa.pub
	\`\`\`
	github

## 
1. repository
	- clone`git clone repository-url` / `git clone repository-url local-directoryname`
		+ clone jquery  `git clone git://github.com/jquery/jquery.git`
		+ clone jquery  my-jquery `git clone git://github.com/jquery/jquery.git my-jquery`
	- `git remote -v`
	- `git remote add [name] [repository-url]`
	- `git remote rm [name]`
	- `git remote set-url origin new-repository-url`
	-  `git pull [remoteName] [localBranchName]`
	-  `git push [remoteName] [localBranchName]`

2. ///
	- staged`git add filename` / `git stage filename`
	- staged `git add --all` / `git add -A`
	- staged`git commit -m 'commit message'` / `git commit -a -m 'commit message'`  -a 
	- Git`git rm filename`
	- Git`git rm --cached filename`
	- `git mv filename newfilename`  `git add -A && git commit -m 'commit message'` Git

	- `git pull (origin branchname)` pull  fetch  merge`git fetch`  `git merge --no-ff origin branchname`  merge 

3. 
	- `git log`
	- `git log -p`
	- `git log --stat`
	- `git log --pretty=oneline` / `git log --pretty='format:"%h - %an, %ar : %s'`
	- 
		+ 10`git log -10`
		+ 2`git log --until=2week` 2`git log --until=2015-08-12`
		+ 2`git log --since=2week` 2`git log --since=2015-08-12`
		+ `git log --committer=user.name` / `git log --author=user.name`
4. 
	- msg/`git commit --amend -m 'new msg'`
	- `git add -A`commit`git reset HEAD filename`
	- `git checkout -- filename` 
	- `git reset --hard <sha1-of-commit>`
		+ `--hard`reset stage and working directory ,<commitid>  HEAD <commitid>
		+ `--soft`nothing changed to stage and working directory ,HEAD<commitid> changed to be committed
		+ `--mixed`default,reset stage ,nothing to working directory 

5. 
	- working directorystaged`git diff`
	- working directoryrepositoryHEAD`git diff HEAD`
	- stagedrepository`git diff --cached` / `git diff --staged`

6. 
	- /`git merge branchname`
	- log`git merge --no-ff branchname` `--no-ff` fast-forward

.config.yml,deploy,:

```
   deploy:
```

```
deploy:
```

```

    hexo s == hexo server
    ```

** hexocoding ** hexo ## ![](http://o7kalf5h3.bkt.clouddn.com/blog-index.png) ## black-blue **spfk**spfk 1. jscss 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. seo 7. 8. styluscss ## [black-blue](https://github.com/maochunguang/black-blue) ## **_config.yml** ```yml google_analytics: xxx baidu_analytics: xxxxxxx disqus: on: false shortname: xxxx # changyan: on: true appid: xxxx conf: xxxxx ``` ## black-blue ### themes`cd themes && git clone https://github.com/maochunguang/black-blue`_config.yml `theme: black-blue` ### ```bash ## rss npm install hexo-generator-feed --save ## sitemap npm install hexo-generator-sitemap --save npm install hexo-generator-baidu-sitemap --save ## url npm install hexo-baidu-url-submit --save ## npm install hexo-generator-search --save ``` ### _config.yml ```yml Plugins: - hexo-generator-feed - hexo-generator-sitemap - hexo-generator-baidu-sitemap ``` rss ```yml feed: type: atom path: atom.xml limit: 20 ``` ```yml search: path: search.json field: post ``` seo ```yml sitemap: path: sitemap.xml baidusitemap: path: baidusitemap.xml ``` ### ```yml ## :hexo new page aboutabout ## Tags Cloud Page: `hexo new page tags` menu: # : /archives/ : /archives/ : /categories// : /categories/digital : /categories/cognition : /about/ ``` ```yml # changyan: on: true appid: xxxx conf: xxxxxxxxxxxx # disqus disqus: on: false shortname: mmmmmm ``` ### **** ```yml # mathjax: false # Socail Share | baidushare: true # seo google_analytics: xxxxxx baidu_analytics: xxcxcxcsdsf ``` ## ### md ``` title: 11- date: 2017-10-30 22:35:37 tags: categories: algorithm --- ** {{ title }}** ``` ### themes/black-blue/source/img/avatar.png, ### themes/black-blue/source/background/, ### 1. themes/black-blue/_config.yml ```yml changyan: on: true uid: xxxxxxx ``` 2. themes/black-blue/layout/_partial/comments/changyan.ejs ```js
``` 3. themes/black-blue/layout/_partial/article.ejs ```js <%- partial('comments/changyan', { uid: theme.changyan.uid }) %> ``` 4. `hexo g`

## mac
- /etc/my.cnf/usr/local/mysql/support-files/
```
cd /usr/local/mysql/support-files
sudo cp my.cnf /etc/my.cnf
```
644rw- r-- r--(664) (rw- rw- r--)
(666)(rw- rw- rw-)
```
sudo chmod 664 /etc/my.cnf
```

- my.cnf
```
[client]
default-character-set=utf8
[mysqld]
collation-server = utf8_unicode_ci
init-connect='SET NAMES utf8'
character-set-server = utf8
[mysql]
default-character-set=utf8
```

## 
mysqlbashzshzsh~/.zshrc,
```
export MYSQL="/usr/local/mysql/bin/"
export PATH="/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin:$MYSQL"
```
mysql,mysql`status;``show variables like '%char%';`
```
| character_set_client     | utf8                                                    |
| character_set_connection | utf8                                                    |
| character_set_database   | utf8                                                    |
| character_set_filesystem | binary                                                  |
| character_set_results    | utf8                                                    |
| character_set_server     | utf8                                                    |
| character_set_system     | utf8                                                    |
| character_sets_dir       | /usr/local/mysql-5.6.30-osx10.11-x86_64/share/charsets/
```
> ,! [][1]

## 
`redis-server`,
redis**ubuntu14**

## 
/etc/redis/redis.conf,

## 
daemonizeyes
`redis-server /etc/redis/redis.conf`

## 
`ps -ef|grep redis-server`redis

## conf
```
# daemon no yes
daemonize no
pidfile /var/run/redis.pid
# 
bind 127.0.0.1
# 
port 6379
tcp-backlog 511
timeout 0
tcp-keepalive 0
loglevel notice
# 
logfile ""
# Redis  16  0 ~ 15
databases 16
save 900 1
save 300 10
save 60 10000
stop-writes-on-bgsave-error yes
rdbcompression yes
rdbchecksum yes
dbfilename dump.rdb
dir ./
slave-serve-stale-data yes
slave-read-only yes
repl-diskless-sync no
repl-diskless-sync-delay 5
repl-disable-tcp-nodelay no
# 
requirepass 123455
slave-priority 100
appendonly no
appendfilename "appendonly.aof"
appendfsync everysec
no-appendfsync-on-rewrite no
auto-aof-rewrite-percentage 100
auto-aof-rewrite-min-size 64mb
aof-load-truncated yes
lua-time-limit 5000
slowlog-log-slower-than 10000
slowlog-max-len 128
latency-monitor-threshold 0
notify-keyspace-events ""
hash-max-ziplist-entries 512
hash-max-ziplist-value 64
list-max-ziplist-entries 512
list-max-ziplist-value 64
set-max-intset-entries 512
zset-max-ziplist-entries 128
zset-max-ziplist-value 64
hll-sparse-max-bytes 3000
activerehashing yes
client-output-buffer-limit normal 0 0 0
client-output-buffer-limit slave 256mb 64mb 60
client-output-buffer-limit pubsub 32mb 8mb 60
hz 10
aof-rewrite-incremental-fsync yes
```

## docker
1. apt

```bash
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y docker.io
sudo ln -sf /usr/bin/docker.io /usr/local/bin/docker
sudo sed -i '$acomplete -F _docker docker' /etc/bash_completion.d/docker.io
```

2. 

```bash
sudo apt-get install apt-transport-https
sudo apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv-keys 36A1D7869245C8950F966E92D8576A8BA88D21E9
sudo bash -c "echo deb https://get.docker.io/ubuntu docker main > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list"
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install lxc-docker
```

` docker -v`

```bash
apt-get update  
apt-get install mongodb-org
```

```bash
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java
export JRE_HOME=${JAVA_HOME}/jre
```

js sdksha1
```js
async getSignConfig(originUrl) {
      let data = {}
      const sha1 = crypto.createHash('sha1')
      const appId = this.app.config.weixin.appID
      const jsapi_ticket = await this.ctx.service.token.getJSApiTicket()
      const noncestr = this.app.config.jsapi.noncestr
      const url = this.app.config.domain + originUrl
      const timestamp = parseInt(new Date().getTime() / 1000)
      // sha1
      const str = `jsapi_ticket=${jsapi_ticket}&noncestr=${noncestr}&timestamp=${timestamp}&url=${url}`
      sha1.update(str)
      const signature = sha1.digest('hex')
      data = { jsapi_ticket, noncestr, timestamp, url, signature, appId }
      return data
    }
```
